/resume-analysis-results.description: Endpoint to retrieve the resume analysis results from resume_analysis_results.json.

200.description: Successful response with resume analysis results

404.description: Resume analysis results file not found

/resume-analyze.description: WebSocket endpoint for real-time resume analysis.

file.description: Resume file content sent in chunks.

filename.description: Resume filename, will default to 'uploaded_resume.pdf' if not provided

200.description: Successful analysis with detailed resume profile.

/multi-upload.description: WebSocket endpoint for multiple file uploads and analysis.

num_files.description: Number of files to be uploaded

/rank-resumes.description: Endpoint to rank resumes against a job description.

/selected-personnel/upload.description: Endpoint to upload a selected personnel's resume to the selected candidates pool.

profile.description: The complete resume profile in JSON format

selection_date.description: Date when the candidate was selected

/selected-personnel.description: Endpoint to retrieve all selected personnel.

profile.description: The complete resume profile in JSON format

selection_date.description: Date when the candidate was selected

/generate-chart-data.description: Generate aggregated chart data from all resumes and save to chart.json

404.description: No resume data available for analysis

/bias-analysis.description: Endpoint to analyze potential biases in the selection process using Gemini.

job_title.description: Job title for which bias analysis is needed

summary.description: Overall summary of the bias analysis

404.description: No selected personnel found for analysis

/send-email/individual.description: Endpoint to send an email to a single candidate from ranked resumes

body.description: Request body containing ranked resumes, candidate index, sender email, and password.

candidate_index.description: Index of the candidate to send the email to

message.description: Message indicating the result of the email sending

/send-email/bulk.description: Endpoint to send emails to all candidates from ranked resumes

body.description: Request body containing ranked resumes, sender email, and password.

status.description: Status of the bulk email sending

summary.description: Summary of the bulk email sending

detailed_results.description: Detailed results of each email sending

/process_url_or_path.description: Endpoint to process a URL or local file path.

input_path.description: URL or local file path to process

compressed.description: Flag indicating whether to return the compressed version of the file.

200.description: Successfully processed the URL or path.

500.description: Error processing the URL or path

/analyze_project/.description: Endpoint to analyze a project based on its code or documentation using Gemini.

input_path.description: URL or local file path to process

/get_file/{file_name}.description: Endpoint to get a file by its name.

file_name.description: Name of the file to retrieve

/process_upload/.description: Endpoint to process an uploaded file.

/update_chat_history.description: Updates or saves chat history based on the received payload.

/analyze_interview.description: Analyzes interview chat histories directly from stored data using Gemini.

history_uid.description: History UID to filter specific interviews
